attributes.action: award an OBE or MBE to Terence Jolley for his services to the community,in mental health care visiting and advocacy for those with M.H problems and for his services to endeavour to strive for better public transport and facilities for the disabled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is worthy of this young man
as a person who is disabled himself
but has been a carer by expierience and an advocate for mental health care advocacy and befriending and patient representation and with an involvement in disability access and transport should be bestowed with an OBE or MBE for his services that he does with diligence and an air of only wishing to do his best and does so without pomposity or self righteousness
